Articles.Content:
Hey everyone,

I'm new to KSP but I love it! I can't wait for it to improve and add new things along the way. I actually did my first in-orbit docking of two ships together. THAT was difficult. I use MechJeb which is a great addon. Thank you to whoever made that.

I hope to give and get as much help as I can along the way.

See you... out there...

-Chris
Looks like you are making your way! Docking is no small feat! Welcome to the Forums. Enjoy your stay

Welcome to the community cjjreed

MechJeb was made by r4m0n, and he'd really like to hear that you enjoy using it

Have fun docking and fly safe!
